page.title: 04HOMES IN PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: HOMES Most of the houses are modern.Some are council houses and the people who live in them pay rent.Many of them are detached bungalows and the people who live in them own them. I live in a house like that.I have a {bedroom}of my own on the ground floor with my parents.The{bathroom}is on the ground floor but we also have a{ {shower}room at the back of the house by the{visitor's}room.The{kitchen}is in the same room as the{dining}room and the {garage}is fixed onto the house. My sister sleeps in the{loft}and has a nice view of the garden. The house is built of concrete blocks covered with plaster and the windows are double glazed.
